short_summary: The Canadian Coal Transition initiative and the Transition initiative-Fund for the future
tags: Business and corporate management consultation services
full_summary:
**Title (English & French):**

* **TSPS (Solutions) - Stream 2 - Business Consulting/Change Management Services**
* **SPTS (Solutions) 2.0 Services-conseils en affaires et services de gestion du changement**

**Procurement Information:**

* **Reference Number:** cb-6475-23237429
* **Solicitation Number:** 4W002-240011
* **Publication Date:** June 15, 2023
* **Closing Date and Time:** July 3, 2023, at 16:00
* **Contract Start Date:** July 10, 2023
* **Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

**Procurement Details:**

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement (SA)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive, with Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Combined rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Procurement Category:** Service (SRV)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Saskatchewan, Alberta, Manitoba
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement

**Contract Description:**

Prairies Economic Development Canada (PrairiesCan) invites proposals from eligible contractors to provide business consulting and change management services as part of the Canadian Coal Transition (CCT) initiative. The requirements include:

* Business consulting services to support economic diversification and skills development in the Canadian coal industry
* Change management services to help workers and communities adapt to the transition
* Impact evaluation and assessment of the CCT initiative's effectiveness in achieving its short-term and long-term outcomes

* Tender notice (French): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6475/npp_4w002-240011_fr.pdf](https://canadabu
